title: Korea Has World's Fastest Smartphone Internet
text:
Korea's smartphone Internet service is the fastest in the world, nudged up by nascent 5G coverage.

According to speed test site Ookla on Sunday, Korea topped a list of 140 countries with an average smartphone connection speed of 76.72 Mbps per second in May, about 2.8 times as fast as the world average of 27.22 Mbps.

In March, Korea still ranked only sixth with a connection speed of 54.98 Mbps, but it moved up to third place in April, when it started the 5G service, with 63.81 Mbps.

The number of 5G subscribers crossed the 1-million mark here on June 10, 69 days after the service was launched. Their number has since reached an estimated 1.7 million.
